plugin.name: ofa
plugin.description: Calculate MusicIP fingerprint from audio files

element.name: ofa
element.description: Find a music fingerprint using MusicIP's libofa
element.author: Milosz Derezynski <internalerror@gmail.com>, Eric Buehl <eric.buehl@gmail.com>

caps.name: sink
caps.details: audio/x-raw, format=(string){ S16LE, S16BE }, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]

caps.details: audio/x-raw, format=(string){ S16LE, S16BE }, rate=(int)[ 1, 2147483647 ], channels=(int)[ 1, 2 ]
